name: Simon and the Dragonfly King
description:
This is a point-n-click adventure game I did as part of   Indie Speed Run and our very first Utah Indie Game Jam.  For a 48-hr project I think this one went very well. It won in the "Best Humor" category.  Theme was "Warmth"

Simon has to save the world from the menacing dragonfly aliens that have blotted out the sun and turned the world cold. Help him save the world with a few laughs.
